Hi Rica

Thanks for the updates.

When the viewport is between approx 1026 and 1400, the banner at top is not fully visible', in particular content at left is cut off, where the button is displayed. This banner also doesn;t display at all on mobile.

The CTA you added by the form at bottom today is also very small on mobile, and can't be read.

Can you fix the resizing between 1026 and 1400, and do you have any suggestions for getting these to display in a legible manner on Mobile?

Thanks

Julian
